summary: Chronicles a Mossad team hand picked to hunt down the terrorists involved in the 1972 Munich Olympic massacre of Israeli athletes.
cast: Steven Bauer|Michael York|Robert Joy|Laurent Malet|Peter Dvorsky|Rod Steiger|Lino Ventura|Colleen Dewhurst|Leslie Hope|John Hirsch|Cyrielle Clair|Linda Griffiths|Daniel Alfie|Hrant Alianak|Sonia Benezra|Carol Ann Francis|Éric Gaudry|Lisa Hull|Neil Kroetsch|Shawn Lawrence|Audi Levy|Liza McIsaac|Karen Racicot|Yair Rubin|Septimiu Sever|Gregory Tal|Miro Wahba|David Zatouti|Pierre Zimmer|Daniela Akerblom
keywords: munich massacre|1972 summer olympics|munich 1972 summer olympics|covert operation|terrorist
title: La espada de Gedeón
